gamerule.bat_ecology.roost_range.descrip: The maximum distance (in blocks) that bats will search for a valid roosting spot.
gamerule.bat_ecology.guano_interval.desc: The time interval (in ticks) between guano drops. Default is 200 ticks (10 seconds).
gamerule.bat_ecology.swarm_max.descripti: The maximum number of bats allowed in a swarm/colony before natural spawning stops.
gamerule.bat_ecology.max_colony_scale.de: The maximum visual scale for large colonies, expressed in permille (e.g., 150 = 1.5x scale).
gamerule.bat_ecology.spawn_mult.descript: A multiplier applied to bat spawning to control population density.
